AT.name: SteamWorld Dig
AT.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig: ein Plattform-Bergbau-Abenteuer. Besuch als einsamer Dampfroboter Rusty eine alte gebeutelte Minenstadt. Stoß durch alte Erde vor zu Schätzen und alten Gefahren. * Entdecke eine Unterwelt voller Geheimnisse, Schätze und Gefahren. * Finde Reste eines entarteten dynamitschwingenden Höhlenvolkes. * Lern die komischen und interessanten Bewohner von Tumbleton kennen und hilf ihnen. * Erlebe tolle scharfe Bilder mit dynamischen Lichtern sowie parallaktischen Hintergrundebenen.

AU.name: SteamWorld Dig
AU.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure. Take the role as Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives to an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below... * Explore an underground world full of secrets, treasure and terrors. * Uncover the remnants of Human civilization, a degenerate race of dynamite-wielding troglodytes. * High-res graphics with dynamic lights and parallaxed background layers.

BG.name: SteamWorld Dig
BG.description: 10/10 - "...an utterly phenomenal video game." - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - "A totally unexpected love letter to bold concepts." - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - "...super-fun, addictive and inspired gameified manual labour..." - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure. Take the role as Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives to an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below... * Explore an underground world full of secrets, treasure and terrors. * Uncover the remnants of Human civilization, a degenerate race of dynamite-wielding troglodytes. * High-res graphics with dynamic lights and parallaxed background layers.

BE.name: SteamWorld Dig
BE.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig est une aventure dans l'univers des mines. Vous incarnez Rusty, un robot mineur solitaire, à la découverte d'une vieille ville minière. Avancez à travers l'ancien monde, enrichissez-vous tout en révélant la menace qui sommeille sous terre... *Explorez les secrets, trésors et dangers des sous-terrains. *Découvrez les reliques des humains, troglodytes dégénérés amateurs de dynamite. *Magnifiques graphismes haute-résolution, éclairage dynamique et plusieurs niveaux d'arrière-plan.

ES.name: SteamWorld Dig
ES.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig es una aventura de plataforma minera. Toma el papel de Rusty, un robot que llega a un pueblo minero en dificultades. Excava a través de la tierra, consigue riquezas mientras descubres la amenaza que se esconde en las profundidades... * Explora un mundo lleno de secretos, tesoros y horrores. * Descubre los restos de la civilización humana, una degenerada raza de trogloditas amantes de la dinamita. * Gráficos de alta resolución con luces dinámicas y capas paralelas de fondo.

IT.name: SteamWorld Dig
IT.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig è un’avventura mineraria a piattaforme. Vesti i panni di Rusty, un solitario steambot minatore, che giunge in una povera città mineraria. Scava nel vecchio mondo, ottieni ricchezze e svela l’antica minaccia sottostante... * Esplora un mondo sotterraneo pieno di segreti, tesori e sorprese terrificanti. * Svela i resti di una civiltà umana, una razza di trogloditi che usano la dinamite. * Grafiche in alta risoluzione con luci dinamiche e sfondi multipli con effetto parallasse.

NL.name: SteamWorld Dig
NL.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com Steamworld Dig is een platform dat gebouwd is rond het avontuur in de mijn. Graaf je een weg door de oude aarde, schatten verzamelend terwijl je een grote dreiging ontsluiert die daar beneden op de loer ligt... * Ontdek een diepe ondergrondse wereld vol met geheimen, schatten en verschrikkingen. * Ontsluier de restanten van een Menselijke beschaving * Mooie graphics in hoge resolutie

NZ.name: SteamWorld Dig
NZ.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure. Take the role as Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives to an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below... * Explore an underground world full of secrets, treasure and terrors. * Uncover the remnants of Human civilization, a degenerate race of dynamite-wielding troglodytes. * High-res graphics with dynamic lights and parallaxed background layers.

PT.name: SteamWorld Dig
PT.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig é uma aventura de exploração mineira. Assume o papel de Rusty, um steambot solitário que chega sem nada a uma antiga cidade mineradora. Descobre como abrir o teu caminho pelo solo, ganhando riquezas enquanto descobres os perigos que se ocultam nas profundezas... * Explora um mundo cheio de segredos, tesouros e terror. * Revela os resquícios da civilização humana, uma raça de trogloditas portadores de dinamites. * Gráficos de resolução com luzes dinâmicas e camadas de fundo.

RU.name: SteamWorld Dig
RU.description: 10/10 - PocketGamer.co.uk 9/10 - NintendoWorldReport.com 9/10 - GamesBlip.com SteamWorld Dig — это платформенная игра-копалка. Играйте за Расти, робота-рудокопа, который прибыл в старый шахтерский городок, погибающий от лишений. Спускайтесь под землю, собирая сокровища и прорывая ход к древнему злу, ждущему в глубинах... * Исследуйте подземный мир, заполненный тайнами, сокровищами и чудовищами. * Найдите останки человеческой цивилизации — дегенеративную расу троглодитов, владеющих динамитом. * Прекрасная графика с динамическим освещением и фоновыми параллакс-слоями.
